texts: 42   Sustainability report
text_str: 42 Sustainability report

texts: External demands and
expectations benefit
Alfa Laval’s business
text_str: External demands and expectations benefit Alfa Laval’s business

texts: The UN introduced new sustainable development goals in September 2015
and alternative solutions for reducing climate emissions were discussed at
the Paris climate conference. Proposals for new legislation on sustainability
reporting, EU legislation on conflict minerals and national action plans on
business and human rights were also presented during the year. Every year,
text_str: The UN introduced new sustainable development goals in September 2015 and alternative solutions for reducing climate emissions were discussed at the Paris climate conference. Proposals for new legislation on sustainability reporting, EU legislation on conflict minerals and national action plans on business and human rights were also presented during the year. Every year,

texts: we receive a growing number of questions from customers and investors about
text_str: we receive a growing number of questions from customers and investors about

texts: the environmental impact of our products and about our work practices,
particularly our efforts to combat corruption. Our employees are also asking
more questions about our work on various sustainability aspects – everything
from human rights to environmental impact.
text_str: the environmental impact of our products and about our work practices, particularly our efforts to combat corruption. Our employees are also asking more questions about our work on various sustainability aspects – everything from human rights to environmental impact.

texts: Alfa Laval firmly believes that external demands and expectations with respect
text_str: Alfa Laval firmly believes that external demands and expectations with respect

texts: to sustainability create opportunities for us to continue to succeed. Our
products reduce energy consumption and optimize the use of resources in
many industrial processes. We offer products for water treatment processes,
as well as products that reduce the marine industry’s emissions to air and
water. We also offer service solutions that ensure the performance of our
products throughout their service life and reconditioning of certain products
in order to reuse materials. We are confident that our products and service
offering are well positioned to meet future challenges.
text_str: to sustainability create opportunities for us to continue to succeed. Our products reduce energy consumption and optimize the use of resources in many industrial processes. We offer products for water treatment processes, as well as products that reduce the marine industry’s emissions to air and water. We also offer service solutions that ensure the performance of our products throughout their service life and reconditioning of certain products in order to reuse materials. We are confident that our products and service offering are well positioned to meet future challenges.

texts: We take a highly proactive approach to implementing our four business
principles in order to ensure that we are working in a way that meets external
sustainability requirements – at all stages of the value chain. It is this com-
bination of what we do and how we do it that will ensure our short and
long-term success.
text_str: We take a highly proactive approach to implementing our four business principles in order to ensure that we are working in a way that meets external sustainability requirements – at all stages of the value chain. It is this com- bination of what we do and how we do it that will ensure our short and long-term success.

texts: Our business principles:
text_str: Our business principles:

texts: Our business principles incorporate the “Protect, Respect and Remedy” framework introduced in the UN Guiding
Principles on Business and Human Rights, as well as the OECD Guidelines for Multinational Enterprises. We are
also signatories to the UN Global Compact.
text_str: Our business principles incorporate the “Protect, Respect and Remedy” framework introduced in the UN Guiding Principles on Business and Human Rights, as well as the OECD Guidelines for Multinational Enterprises. We are also signatories to the UN Global Compact.

texts: However, it would not be realistic for us to
tackle them all at the same time. So we set
priorities to reach a good balance between
the severity of the risk and our ability to
influence and create meaningful change.
text_str: However, it would not be realistic for us to tackle them all at the same time. So we set priorities to reach a good balance between the severity of the risk and our ability to influence and create meaningful change.

management and comprising managers
from relevant departments.

respected and implemented throughout the
sales channels used for Alfa Laval products.
The CEC also handles commercial dilemmas
originating from conflicts and human rights

texts: Group Crisis Management
text_str: Group Crisis Management

texts: Customer safety is a prime concern, which
is why any product-related safety issues are
automatically referred to the Group Crisis
Management organization. This ensures that
a thorough root cause analysis is performed
and appropriate corrective actions are
implemented, including product recalls if
necessary. This organization is also con-
vened to handle incoming warnings from
our whistleblower system.
text_str: Customer safety is a prime concern, which is why any product-related safety issues are automatically referred to the Group Crisis Management organization. This ensures that a thorough root cause analysis is performed and appropriate corrective actions are implemented, including product recalls if necessary. This organization is also con- vened to handle incoming warnings from our whistleblower system.

texts: Review: Board and management
text_str: Review: Board and management

ment perform separate reviews of the Group’s
text_str: Once per year, the Board and Group manage- ment perform separate reviews of the Group’s

established to achieve the objectives stipu-
lated in the business principles.

risk suppliers
–  Reducing the frequency of workplace
accidents in our workshops and the per-
centage of serious accidents.

texts: Suppliers and supply chain – status 2015
text_str: Suppliers and supply chain – status 2015

texts: The procurement departments bear the main
responsibility for both risk assessments and
risk reduction measures. In 2015, a new
process was established to ensure that our
suppliers implement continuous improve-
ments in line with our business principles.
This process begins by mapping out our
text_str: The procurement departments bear the main responsibility for both risk assessments and risk reduction measures. In 2015, a new process was established to ensure that our suppliers implement continuous improve- ments in line with our business principles. This process begins by mapping out our

texts: suppliers and their processes. We have found
text_str: suppliers and their processes. We have found

texts: that the main risks arise in countries with
ineffective enforcement of national employ-
ment legislation and international human
rights standards. However, we also focus
on suppliers with inherent health, safety or
environmental risks due to the nature of their
operations (for example, metal polishing and
foundry work). We review how well suppliers
in high-risk zones comply with our business
text_str: that the main risks arise in countries with ineffective enforcement of national employ- ment legislation and international human rights standards. However, we also focus on suppliers with inherent health, safety or environmental risks due to the nature of their operations (for example, metal polishing and foundry work). We review how well suppliers in high-risk zones comply with our business

texts: principles and work together with the suppliers
text_str: principles and work together with the suppliers

texts: to prepare an improvement plan, which is
then followed up. Suppliers with serious
breaches are given between one and six
months to implement improvements. If no
progress has been achieved by the end of
the period, the supplier may be phased out.
Education is an important part of the
improvement process and all employees in
Alfa Laval’s procurement organization receive
training in the company’s business principles.
Procurement managers must also undergo
mandatory anti-corruption training. Suppliers
in countries deemed to be high risk are also
offered training in the areas covered by the
business principles.
text_str: to prepare an improvement plan, which is then followed up. Suppliers with serious breaches are given between one and six months to implement improvements. If no progress has been achieved by the end of the period, the supplier may be phased out. Education is an important part of the improvement process and all employees in Alfa Laval’s procurement organization receive training in the company’s business principles. Procurement managers must also undergo mandatory anti-corruption training. Suppliers in countries deemed to be high risk are also offered training in the areas covered by the business principles.

text_str: Safe workplace – status 2015

to provide better instructions on how Alfa
Laval’s organization is to tackle safety issues
and outline the guidelines and work practices
to be followed. In 2015, we also developed
text_str: A new safety manual was developed in order to provide better instructions on how Alfa Laval’s organization is to tackle safety issues and outline the guidelines and work practices to be followed. In 2015, we also developed

texts: Business integrity:
text_str: Business integrity:

texts: This principle includes conflicts of interest,
political contributions, anti-bribery and anti-
corruption (ABAC), fair competition, legisla-
tive compliance and corporate governance.
The CEC is responsible for implementing risk
assessments and risk reduction processes,
while the line managers are responsible for
ensuring compliance with Group policies and
all applicable laws, rules and regulations.
Internal audits are conducted regularly and
are intended to ensure that appropriate pro-
cesses are in place and functioning properly.
text_str: This principle includes conflicts of interest, political contributions, anti-bribery and anti- corruption (ABAC), fair competition, legisla- tive compliance and corporate governance. The CEC is responsible for implementing risk assessments and risk reduction processes, while the line managers are responsible for ensuring compliance with Group policies and all applicable laws, rules and regulations. Internal audits are conducted regularly and are intended to ensure that appropriate pro- cesses are in place and functioning properly.

texts: Anti-corruption processes – status 2015
text_str: Anti-corruption processes – status 2015

texts: In 2014, the company rolled out improved
ABAC processes, including e-learning
modules in multiple languages for its sales
personnel. In 2015, we also launched a
mandatory training program for employees
working with procurement.
text_str: In 2014, the company rolled out improved ABAC processes, including e-learning modules in multiple languages for its sales personnel. In 2015, we also launched a mandatory training program for employees working with procurement.

texts: Environment:
text_str: Environment:

texts: Our products are our main contribution to
sustainability since they play an increasingly
important role in minimizing energy con-
text_str: Our products are our main contribution to sustainability since they play an increasingly important role in minimizing energy con-

texts: sumption and thus greenhouse gas emissions
text_str: sumption and thus greenhouse gas emissions

texts: at the same time as they optimize the use
of natural resources, including the recycling
of water in industrial processes. In some
cases, Alfa Laval’s environmental solutions
are essential to ensuring that industrial pro-
cesses comply with emissions legislation.
text_str: , at the same time as they optimize the use of natural resources, including the recycling of water in industrial processes. In some cases, Alfa Laval’s environmental solutions are essential to ensuring that industrial pro- cesses comply with emissions legislation.

texts: Our environmental focus is on:
text_str: Our environmental focus is on:

texts: –  Ensuring that new products have a lower
environmental impact than the ones they
replace.
–  Minimizing greenhouse gas emissions from
manufacturing and goods transportation.
–  Ensuring that we have good control over
the use of chemicals associated with
environmental or health risks.
text_str: – Ensuring that new products have a lower environmental impact than the ones they replace. – Minimizing greenhouse gas emissions from manufacturing and goods transportation. – Ensuring that we have good control over the use of chemicals associated with environmental or health risks.

texts: operations. Alfa Laval aims to consistently
improve its products so that all new products
are more environmentally friendly than the
products they replace. Accordingly, the
effective implementation of a life cycle per-
text_str: operations. Alfa Laval aims to consistently improve its products so that all new products are more environmentally friendly than the products they replace. Accordingly, the effective implementation of a life cycle per-

texts: spective is a key component of our product
design process.  In 2015, some 145 life
cycle assessments were made. The LCAs
done on product replacements showed
improvements of up to 42 percent.
text_str: spective is a key component of our product design process. In 2015, some 145 life cycle assessments were made. The LCAs done on product replacements showed improvements of up to 42 percent.

texts: Greenhouse gas emissions – status 2015
text_str: Greenhouse gas emissions – status 2015

texts: Our goal is to continuously minimize the
greenhouse gas emissions from manufac-
turing and goods transportation. Our focus
in 2015 was on the transportation of goods
and the projects we conducted have yielded
results in the form of a reduction in emissions
during the year.
text_str: Our goal is to continuously minimize the greenhouse gas emissions from manufac- turing and goods transportation. Our focus in 2015 was on the transportation of goods and the projects we conducted have yielded results in the form of a reduction in emissions during the year.

texts: Chemicals – status 2015
text_str: Chemicals – status 2015

texts: All of Alfa Laval’s production and service
facilities are to have good control over the
chemical substances used. They must also
make safety data sheets available that clearly
text_str: All of Alfa Laval’s production and service facilities are to have good control over the chemical substances used. They must also make safety data sheets available that clearly

texts: indicate whether chemicals on the company’s
text_str: indicate whether chemicals on the company’s

texts: Transparency
text_str: Transparency

texts: Alfa Laval aims to build trust through open
dialog. This is particularly true of the dialog
the company engages in with various parties
concerning its progress and challenges in
the area of sustainability.
text_str: Alfa Laval aims to build trust through open dialog. This is particularly true of the dialog the company engages in with various parties concerning its progress and challenges in the area of sustainability.

texts: Our focus in the area of transparency is on:
text_str: Our focus in the area of transparency is on:

texts: –  Improving our dialog with customers
when it comes to our sustainability results.
text_str: – Improving our dialog with customers when it comes to our sustainability results.

texts: Greater dialog concerning business
principles – status 2015
text_str: Greater dialog concerning business principles – status 2015

texts: Over the past few years, the number of
questions we receive from customers regard-
ing our work on sustainability has increased.
Based on our goal of being transparent
and at the request of our customers, we
therefore began reporting in Eco Vadis.
Facing greater pressure for public informa-
tion about our sustainability efforts, we aim
to be as transparent as possible when it
comes to communicating our guidelines,
work practices and the results of our work.
text_str: Over the past few years, the number of questions we receive from customers regard- ing our work on sustainability has increased. Based on our goal of being transparent and at the request of our customers, we therefore began reporting in Eco Vadis. Facing greater pressure for public informa- tion about our sustainability efforts, we aim to be as transparent as possible when it comes to communicating our guidelines, work practices and the results of our work.

texts: We are also working actively to strengthen
text_str: We are also working actively to strengthen

texts: our cooperation with our customers in the
area of sustainability. For example, Alfa Laval
is participating in a collaborative project
related to sustainable supply chains in the
marine industry.
In 2015, we also worked to increase
internal awareness of our business principles,
their content and background.
text_str: our cooperation with our customers in the area of sustainability. For example, Alfa Laval is participating in a collaborative project related to sustainable supply chains in the marine industry. In 2015, we also worked to increase internal awareness of our business principles, their content and background.

texts: Alfa Laval’s work contributes directly to many of the UN’s newly launched Sustainable Development goals. The following
are some examples:
text_str: Alfa Laval’s work contributes directly to many of the UN’s newly launched Sustainable Development goals. The following are some examples:

texts: SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT GOAL
EXAMPLES OF HOW ALFA LAVAL CONTRIBUTES TO THEIR SUCCESS
text_str: SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT GOAL EXAMPLES OF HOW ALFA LAVAL CONTRIBUTES TO THEIR SUCCESS

texts: Goal  2:
text_str: Goal 2:

texts: End hunger, achieve food security
and improved nutrition and pro-
mote sustainable agriculture.
text_str: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and pro- mote sustainable agriculture.

texts: Alfa Laval products and solutions improve shelf life, reduce waste and make
food production hygienic and safe. The energy use reduction made possible
for food and fruit processing plants using pumps from Alfa Laval is about 50
percent. Our pumps, valves, separators and heat exchangers are important
components in food production, while our refrigeration solutions help keep
food fresh during storage and distribution.
text_str: Alfa Laval products and solutions improve shelf life, reduce waste and make food production hygienic and safe. The energy use reduction made possible for food and fruit processing plants using pumps from Alfa Laval is about 50 percent. Our pumps, valves, separators and heat exchangers are important components in food production, while our refrigeration solutions help keep food fresh during storage and distribution.

texts: Goal  6:
text_str: Goal 6:

texts: Ensure availability and sustainable
management of water and sani-
tation for all.
text_str: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sani- tation for all.

texts: Alfa Laval offers a wide range of technologies to treat wastewater, among
them decanter centrifuges which help dewater sludge in municipal wastewater
treatment plants, contributing to clean water around the globe.
text_str: Alfa Laval offers a wide range of technologies to treat wastewater, among them decanter centrifuges which help dewater sludge in municipal wastewater treatment plants, contributing to clean water around the globe.

texts: Goal  7:
text_str: Goal 7:

texts: Ensure access to affordable,
reliable, sustainable and modern
energy for all.
text_str: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all.

texts: The world’s growing demand for energy is encouraging the growth of alter-
native energy sources, such as making biofuel from waste. Alfa Laval prod-
ucts are involved throughout the biofuel production process, from heating
and cooling to mixing and separation.
text_str: The world’s growing demand for energy is encouraging the growth of alter- native energy sources, such as making biofuel from waste. Alfa Laval prod- ucts are involved throughout the biofuel production process, from heating and cooling to mixing and separation.

texts: Goal  11:
text_str: Goal 11:

texts: Make cities and human settle-
ments inclusive, safe, resilient
and sustainable.
text_str: Make cities and human settle- ments inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable.

texts: Alfa Laval provides energy-efficient district heating and cooling – often using
waste heat from other processes, as well as thermal storage solutions that
save energy and money. The offering also includes products that play an
important role in the wastewater cleaning process in municipal wastewater
treatment plants in cities all over the world.
text_str: Alfa Laval provides energy-efficient district heating and cooling – often using waste heat from other processes, as well as thermal storage solutions that save energy and money. The offering also includes products that play an important role in the wastewater cleaning process in municipal wastewater treatment plants in cities all over the world.

texts: Goal  13:
text_str: Goal 13:

texts: Take urgent action to combat
climate change and its impacts.
text_str: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.

texts: Conserve and sustainably use the
text_str: Conserve and sustainably use the

texts: oceans, seas and marine resources

texts: Alfa Laval’s Marine & Diesel division offers a whole range of products in the
areas of energy and the environment, mainly for customers in the marine
industry. The offering includes exhaust gas cleaning systems, heat recovery
systems and ballast water treatment systems.
text_str: Alfa Laval’s Marine & Diesel division offers a whole range of products in the areas of energy and the environment, mainly for customers in the marine industry. The offering includes exhaust gas cleaning systems, heat recovery systems and ballast water treatment systems.
